casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Wanda Torres (12290)

O’Connell, Heiman and Freedman, Js.

Argued June 10 decision released June 28, 1994 *935Richard S. Cramer, with whom, on the brief, was Brian M. O’Connell, for the appellant (defendant). John A. East III, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Paul E. Murray, senior assistant state’s attorney, and James E. Thomas, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
